title: Restaurant Brodocz
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Well-established organic restaurant in a traditional half-timbered house with courtyard, in the city center. Offers a variety of vegetarian and vegan dishes as well gluten-free. Popular among local veg*ns. No-smoking. Parking in Karstadt car park.
